name: @afni_refacer_run
author: AFNI Developers
description: This script re-faces one input dataset, using a master shell dataset to write over the subject's 'face' region.

inputs.description: Name of input dataset; can contain path information.
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Replace the computed face+ears voxels with all zeros instead of the artificial face (ears are also removed)
inputs.name: Mode Deface

inputs.description: Replace the subject's face+ears with a scaled set of artificial values
inputs.name: Mode Reface

inputs.description: Replace the subject's face+ears+skull with a scaled set of artificial values (i.e., like 'refacing', but replacing a more complete shell around the subject's brain)
inputs.name: Mode Reface Plus

inputs.description: Output three volumes: one defaced, one refaced and one reface_plused
inputs.name: Mode All

inputs.description: Use 3drefit and nifti_tool to anonymize the output datasets
inputs.name: Anonymize Output

inputs.description: Specify any cost function that is allowed by 3dAllineate (default: lpa)
inputs.name: Cost Function

inputs.description: Specify which shell to use. Options: afni_refacer_shell_sym_1.0.nii.gz (traditional), afni_refacer_shell_sym_2.0.nii.gz (more face/neck removal). Default: afni_refacer_shell_sym_1.0.nii.gz
inputs.name: Shell Option

inputs.description: Don't delete temp working directory (default: remove working directory)
inputs.name: No Clean

inputs.description: Don't make pretty images to automatically view the results of re/defacing
inputs.name: No Images

inputs.description: Final two file outputs will overwrite any existing files of the same name (default: don't do this). NB: this option does not apply to the working directory
inputs.name: Overwrite

inputs.description: Run the 3dAllineate part herein with '-verb' (for verbosity)
inputs.name: Verbose

output-files.description: Refaced volume (face+ears replaced with artificial values)
output-files.name: Output Reface File

output-files.description: Reface_plused volume (face+ears+skull replaced with artificial values)
output-files.name: Output Reface Plus File

output-files.description: Face+ears used to replace or remove subject data
output-files.name: Output Face File

output-files.description: Face+ears+skull used to replace subject data
output-files.name: Output Face Plus File
